group_1.textLeft: Wow...! We’re here! Kamihama!
Arisa, where’s the taiyaki store?

group_1.textRight: Are you really looking forward to it that much?

group_1.textLeft: Talking about taiyaki made me want to eat it.
Come on, you two! We're not here to play.

group_1.textRight: Ehh...it’s fine, it’s just a little bit...

group_1.textLeft: We have to investigate first. That’s why we’re here.

group_1.textRight: Okaaay...
Alright, alright...

group_1.textLeft: Well, first we need to gather information.

group_1.textRight: I overheard some interesting things on the train.
The one about the "missing people in Kamihama"?

group_1.textLeft: I heard some kids in uniforms talking about it.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that one.
...Could there be a serial murder case@in Kamihama too...?

group_1.textLeft: That’s a possibility...
It’ll be more efficient for the four of us to split up@and investigate in teams of two.

group_1.textRight: It'd be best to split me and Chisato up, right?
We’ve been here before, after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...You’re not going to slack off, are you?

group_1.textRight: Geeze... If you doubt me...
I’ll definitely bring back amazing information@before you do!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you really think you can?
Matsuri, which one do you want to@investigate with?

group_1.textRight: Let's play rock, paper, scissors!

group_1.textLeft: Rock, paper, scissors?

group_1.textRight: Arisa and Chisato should play@rock-paper-scissors too.
How about a pair of winners and losers?

group_1.textLeft: I see, that’s fine.

group_1.textRight: Alright! I’ll win!

group_1.textCenter: Here we go, rock, paper, scissors...

group_1.textRight: Losing right from the get-go...@What a bad start...
But just wait and see!
I've got a special plan up my sleeve!

group_1.textLeft: Special plan...?
What is it?

group_1.textRight: That just worries me...

group_1.textLeft: It’ll be fine!@Trust me!

group_1.textRight: What about you and Chisato?

group_1.textLeft: If we want to do research, we should start with@the library.

group_1.textRight: Library...

group_1.textLeft: Nowadays, most information is available on@the Internet, but,
there’s still some information you can only find@at the library.
For example, local newspapers that aren’t in@data format.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see...!@[chara:403401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:403401:motion_400][chara:403401:cheek_0][chara:403401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:403401:lipSynch_1]That’s Senpai for you!
